name: Fur Free Alliance
goal: As an international coalition of animal protection organisations, the Fur Free Alliance (FFA) works to end the exploitation and killing of animals for fur. The FFA represents millions of supporters worldwide. In particular, the FFA focuses on the deprivation and cruelty suffered by fur-bearing animals both in wild trapping and industrial fur farming. To achieve its aims the FFA seeks to: inform the public about the substantial animal suffering caused by the fur industry; advance legislative actions and in-depth investigations as needed; target consumers and the fashion industry to encourage readily available alternatives; work nationally and internationally through joint or individual campaigns.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Environment
